name: Money Exchange
description: An establishment for converting between different forms of currency; adventurers can exchange foreign money, cash in valuable metals, or learn about local banking practices.
atmosphere: The exchange has a formal, trustworthy atmosphere with the scent of official documents and the sound of financial transactions. The air carries the promise of reliable service and the essential nature of monetary conversion, while the atmosphere crackles with the energy of international trade and the importance of financial infrastructure.
